name: Sunboi
description:
The Game “Sunboi”,  is a small farming/adventure game where you play as a sheep, which is planting and harvesting flowers, to buy a spaceship and get away from its current situation. 

The danger is that during night wolves come out of the woods to steel your money. During the day you need to work efficient to make progress. But watch out and don’t be outside to late. 

Participants are: Graphics: Lukas, Jornupto, Martin, Programming: Martin, Lukas, Sounddesign: Arthur, Leonhard, Music: Leonhard, Gametesting: Max, Senan.
